ReplicaResponse.summary: This class is a wrapper that contains all response of all replicas, also this class contains too the final response that the application will see.

ReplicaResponses.summary: This property is a dictionary that contains the final response of all replicas, this dictionary is compose of int that is the replicaId and T that is the response from a replica.

ReplicaResponseC.summary: This constructor allow you create a instance of this class to save all response and final response to send an application.
ReplicaResponseC.param: Dictionary compose of int that is the replicaId and T that is the response from a replica.
This parameter represent final response to send an application.

Response.summary: This property is the final response that send to the application.
